mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FSS_CREDITLOAN_RESULT(PRDT_DIV,ERR_CD,ERR_MSG,TOTAL_COUNT,MAX_PAGE_NO,NOW_PAGE_NO,ID_FRT,DT_FRT,ID_LST,DT_LST) VALUES ( #{prdt_div, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{err_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{err_msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{total_count, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{max_page_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{now_page_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},SYSDATE ,#{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO FSS_COMPANY_OPTION (DCLS_MONTH,FIN_CO_NO,AREA_CD,AREA_NM,EXIS_YN,ID_FRT,DT_FRT,ID_LST,DT_LST) VALUES ( #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{area_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{area_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{exis_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},SYSDATE,#{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
